price: 17. Та koros gaali elle ginniime inna ma wagittaay ma cubbussaa?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
